#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<math.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
   {
    int test,remainder,quotient;
    int num[101],i=0,j,ans=0;
    cin>>test;
    quotient=test;
    while(quotient!=0)
        {
         num[i++]=(quotient%2);
         quotient=quotient/2;
        }
        for(j=0;j<i;j=j+2)
        swap(num[j],num[j+1]);
        for(j=i-1;j>=0;j--)
        ans+=num[j]*pow(2,j);
        cout<<ans<<endl;
    return 0;

}
